sentence.Network_en: Pemberton and Lousie were obscurely linked.
sentence.Network_cn: 佩倍尔顿和露易丝模糊不清地融合起来.

sentence.Network_en: People often write obscurely because they have never taken the trouble to learn to write clearly.
sentence.Network_cn: 有人写不清楚,往往是因为他们从来没有花力气学着写清楚.

sentence.Network_en: Only is at that time also small, thinks really obscurely.
sentence.Network_cn: 只是那个时候还小, 觉得煞是费解.
